Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
CodeDisplay
LA9633-4Present
LA9634-2Absent

title.value: Observation Codes for status of a PhenotypicFeature

publisher.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

name.value: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health - Clinical and Phenotypic Data Capture Work Stream

description.value: The LOINC codes for present if a feature is observed and absent if a feature was excluded.
